ALL_JOBS.NO_JOBS: There are no job offers at the moment

APPLY.NB: To apply for a job, phone number, seniority and skills are mandatory fields. In addition, you should upload a pdf resume or fill the resume fields (education and experience at least) or you can do both.
APPLY.NB_SUITE: To enhance your resume efficiency, it's better to fill all the fields and update them.

AUTH.SIGNIN_DESC: Hello! Sign in with your email

DESCRIPTION.DESC: A description is useful to understand who you are at a glance, it can make a real difference
DESCRIPTION.MIN: Presentation must be at least 30 characters
DESCRIPTION.TITLE: Describe myself in a few lines

DOCUMENT.DESC: Your profile resume will allow you to be shortlisted
DOCUMENT.DESC2: It will only be accessible to Spark-it company
DOCUMENT.NO_DOC: You have not uploaded your resume yet

FOOTER.DESC: Spark-it is a digital services company. We offer digital development and consulting solutions for all market players: Start-up, SMEs and large groups.

IDENTITY.ADDRESS_MAX: Current address can contain maximum 255 characters
IDENTITY.ADDRESS_MIN: Current address must be at least 3 characters
IDENTITY.FULLNAME_FORMAT: Full name must contains 2 or 3 words and only alphabetic characters
IDENTITY.FULLNAME_MAX: Full name can contain maximum 255 characters

JOB_FORM.LOCATION_MIN: Location must be at least 3 characters
JOB_FORM.TITLE: Title
JOB_FORM.TITLE_MIN: Title must be at least 7 characters

LANDING.CAROUSEL_TEXT: Spark-it is a digital services company. We offer digital development and consulting solutions for all market players: Start-up, SMEs and large groups.
LANDING.CAROUSEL_TITLE: Find Jobs Now more Easy Way
LANDING.DESC: Young and dynamic, Spark-it has very quickly developed its activity by leveraging the experience of developers who are now employees within our company. Their continuous training, professionalism and expertise are all guarantees of results in the implementation of effective solutions for our customers.
LANDING.NO_JOB: There are no job offers at the moment
LANDING.WHY1: We encourage career growth and we  give the tools and guidance to achieve subject matter expertise
LANDING.WHY2: We have a fun environment to work in where you are surrounded by like-minded people who are passionate about tech
LANDING.WHY3: We give opportunity to work on projects abroad with some of the world's leading brands

LANGUAGES.DESC: Add your languages, even your native one!

PASSWORD.EMAIL_VALID: Email must be a valid email address
PASSWORD.MIN: Password must be at least 8 characters
PASSWORD.NEW_MATCH: New password should be different to the current password
PASSWORD.NEW_MIN: Password must be at least 8 characters

PASS_CHANGE.TITLE: Change password
PASS_CHANGE.WITH_CODE: Write your recovery code and set a new password

REQUEST_CODE.DESC: Enter your email address and we’ll send a code to reset your password
REQUEST_CODE.TITLE: Forgot password
